summary: Provides a wrapper that converts a node‑classification sampler into a sampler suitable for edge‑prediction or link‑prediction tasks, handling negative edge construction, lazy feature loading, and producing sampled subgraphs for model training.
business_intent: Enables efficient generation of training samples for graph link‑prediction models by reusing existing node‑classification samplers and streamlining edge‑level data preparation in machine‑learning pipelines.
